thread.section_title: The 2 Week Diet Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The 2 Week Diet | www.2weekdiet.com
thread.title: Rebecca
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by Rebecca

author: Rebecca
title: Rebecca
text: This weight loss book is a good start for anyone, especially those who are just starting out in their search for weight loss. Because of how detailed and explanatory it is, you'll not only learn how to eat better, but you'll also learn how calories and fat are burned and what it takes to burn them. Whether you are experienced in weight loss or a beginner, The 2 Week Diet is great for anyone.
